tool_description: Enrich your leads with contact emails, company URLs, age, gender, ethnicity, and more.
name: Lead Enrichment by From Data With Love
title: Lead Enrichment by From Data With Love
tool_name: Lead Enrichment by From Data With Love

api_list.name: Get Company Domain
api_list.description: Get the domain name for a company. If you supply a "webhook_url=<string>" and "verify=true" parameters in the query, the API will test each potential domain to see if the website belongs to a company with the name "name=<string>"

api_list.name: Get Account Info
api_list.description: Get account and API info. This will list the account's maximum allowed API requests per month and requests per minute, as well as the number of requests performed so far for this billing period.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fromdatawithlove-lead-enrichment-by-from-data-with-love-v1.p.rapidapi.com/account/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fromdatawithlove-lead-enrichment-by-from-data-with-love-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fromdatawithlove-lead-enrichment-by-from-data-with-love-v1.p.rapidapi.com/account/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fromdatawithlove-lead-enrichment-by-from-data-with-love-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
